title: Reinstatement or relicensing
context: ยง431:9-239 Reinstatement or relicensing. The commissioner shall not reinstate the license of or relicense any licensee or former licensee as to whom a license has been suspended, revoked, or extension refused, until: (1) Any cause for the suspension, revocation, or refusal of such license is no longer existing; (2) Any fine levied upon the licensee pursuant to section 431:9-238 and section 431:9-240 has been fully paid; and (3) The commissioner is satisfied that such causes for the suspension, revocation, or refusal of such license will not reoccur in the future. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2; am L 1995, c 232, ยง16]
